Verses: 1 ippadiyaanaal, Yoodhanudaiya Menmai Enna? Viruththasedhanaththinaale Pirayojanam Enna?
2 adhu Evvidhaththilum Migudhiyaayirukkiradhu; Dhevanudaiya Vaakkiyangal Avargalidaththil Oppuvikkappattadhu Viseshiththa Menmaiyaame.
3 silar Visuvaasiyaamarponaalumenna? Avargaludaiya Avisuvaasam Dhevanudaiya Unmaiyai Avamaakkumo?

4 appadiyaakkamaattaadhu: Neer Ummudaiya Vasanangalil Needhibararaai Vilangavum, Ummudaiya Niyaayam Visaarikkappadumpodhu Vetriyadaiyavum Ippadiyaayitru Endru Ezhudhiyirukkirapadi, Dhevane Saththiyabarar Endrum, Endha Manushanum Poiyan Endrum Solvomaaga.

5 naan Manushar Pesugira Piragaaramaaip Pesugiren; Nammudaiya Aneedhi Dhevanudaiya Needhiyai Vilangappanninaal Enna Solluvom? Kobaakkinaiyaich Seluththugira Dhevan Aneedharaayirukkiraar Endru Sollalaamaa?
6 appadich Sollakkoodaadhu; Sollakkoodumaanaal, Dhevan Ulagaththai Niyaayantheerppadheppadi?
7 andriyum, En Poiyinaale Dhevanudaiya Saththiyam Avarukku Magimaiyundaaga Vilanginadhundaanaal, Ini Naan Paaviyendru Theerkkappaduvaanen?

8 nanmai Varumpadikkuth Theemaiseyvomaaga Endrum Sollalaamallavaa? Naangal Appadip Podhikkiravargalendrum Silar Engalaith Dhooshiththuch Sollugiraargale; Appadip Podhikkiravargal Mel Varum Aakkinai Needhiyaayirukkum.
9 aanaalum Enna? Avargalaippaarkkilum Naangal Viseshiththavargalaa? Evvalavenum Viseshiththavargalalla. Yoodhar Girekkar Yaavarum Paavaththirkutpattavargalenbadhai Munbu Thirushtaandhappaduththinome.
10 andhappadiye: Needhimaan Oruvanaagilum Illai;
11 unarvullavan Illai; Dhevanaith Thedugiravan Illai;
12 ellaarum Vazhithappi, Egamaaik Kettupponaargal; Nanmaiseygiravan Illai, Oruvanaagilum Illai.
13 avargal Thondai Thirakkappatta Piredhakkuzhi, Thangal Naavugalaal Vanjanaiseygiraargal; Avargaludaiya Udhadugalin Keezhe Paambin Visham Irukkiradhu;
14 avargal Vaai Sabippinaalum Kasappinaalum Niraindhirukkiradhu;
15 avargal Kaalgal Raththanjsindhugiradharkuth Theevirikkiradhu;
16 naasamum Nirppandhamum Avargal Vazhigalilirukkiradhu;
17 samaadhaana Vazhiyai Avargal Ariyaadhirukkiraargal;
18 avargal Kangalukku Munbaagath Dheyvabayamillai, Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhe.

19 melum, Vaaigal Yaavum Adaikkappadumpadikkum, Ulagaththaar Yaavarum Dhevanudaiya Aakkinaiththeerppukku Edhuvaanavargalaagumpadikkum, Niyaayappiramaanam Sollugiradhellaam Niyaayappiramaanaththukku Utpattirukkiravargalukke Sollugiradhendru Arindhirukkirom.
20 ippadiyirukka, Paavaththai Arigira Arivu Niyaayappiramaanaththinaal Varugirapadiyaal, Endha Manushanum Niyaayappiramaanaththin Kiriyaiyinaale Dhevanukku Munbaaga Needhimaanaakkappaduvadhillai.
21 ippadiyirukka, Niyaayappiramaanamillaamal Dhevaneedhi Veliyaakkappattirukkiradhu; Adhaikkuriththu Niyaayappiramaanamum Theerkkadharisanangalum Saatchiyidugiradhu.
22 adhu Yesukiristhuvaippatrum Visuvaasaththinaale Balikkum Dhevaneedhiye; Visuvaasikkira Evargalukkullum Evargalmelum Adhu Balikkum, Viththiyaasame Illai.
23 ellaarum Paavanjseydhu, Dhevamagimaiyatravargalaagi,
24 ilavasamaai Avarudaiya Kirubaiyinaale Kiristhu Yesuvilulla Meetpaikkondu Needhimaangalaakkappadugiraargal;

25 dhevan Porumaiyaayirundha Murkaalaththil Nadandha Paavangalaith Thaam Poruththukkondadhaikkuriththuth Thammudaiya Needhiyaik Kaanbikkumporuttaagavum, Thaam Needhiyullavarum, Yesuvinidaththil Visuvaasamaayirukkiravanai Needhimaanaakkugiravarumaai Vilangumpadi, Ikkaalaththile Thamadhu Needhiyaik Kaanbikkumporuttaagavum,
26 kiristhu Yesuvinudaiya Raththaththaippatrum Visuvaasaththinaale Balikkum Kirubaadhaara Baliyaaga Avaraiye Erpaduththinaar.
27 ippadiyirukka, Menmaipaaraattal Enge? Adhu Neekkappattadhe. Endhap Piramaanaththinaale? Kiriyaap Piramaanaththinaaleyaa? Alla; Visuvaasappiramaanaththinaaleye.
28 aadhalaal Manushan Niyaayappiramaanaththin Kiriyaigalillaamal Visuvaasaththinaaleye Needhimaanaakkappadugiraan Endru Theerkkirom.
29 dhevan Yoodharukkumaaththiramaa Dhevan? Purajaadhigalukkum Dhevanallavaa? Aam Purajaadhigalukkum Avar Dhevandhaan.
30 viruththasedhanamullavargalai Visuvaasaththinaalum, Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargalai Visuvaasaththin Moolamaayum Needhimaangalaakkugira Dhevan Oruvare.
31 appadiyaanaal, Visuvaasaththinaale Niyaayappiramaanaththai Avamaakkugiromaa? Appadiyalla; Niyaayappiramaanaththai Nilainiruththugirome.
